name: Keep Pit Alive
description:
Help Pit The Pony by keeping him alive as he tries to escape the coal mine!

Can you find all 100 apples while keeping Pit alive?

Controls: -A/D to run. -W to jump. -Space to kick.

Audio credits:

‘Apple_Crunch_14” by Koops (https://freesound.org/people/Koops/sounds/20277/)

“Wood break” by Deathscyp (https://freesound.org/people/Deathscyp/sounds/443293/)

“Happy Cave” by ADnova (https://freesound.org/people/ADnova/sounds/435531/)

“Life Lost Game Over” by noirenex (https://freesound.org/people/noirenex/sounds/159408/)

“Horse Whinny 1” by GoodListener (https://freesound.org/people/GoodListener/sounds/322445/)
